title: Gaztelu Bira App
description:
Android app that tracks and displays statistics for a local sports team based in Pamplona, Navarra (Spain). 

It displays player stats, match results, and other team data.  The app, written in XML follows Android development best practices
full_description: It also supports admin functionalities for adding games and stats, and includes a player comparison feature with a radar chart.

title: Easy Spot
description:
Android app that allows users to create a family group in order to share last parking location of their cars. 

It uses Google Maps API to display the location of the cars and Firebase Auth and Firestore to store the data.

title: Personal portfolio
description:
Personal portfolio made as a website app that explains my professional experience and showcases my projects. 

It is a responsive website that adapts to different screen sizes and devices.

title: MathMania
description:
Android app that allows users to practice math operations. 

It includes different levels of difficulty and a timer to challenge the user. The app is written in Kotlin and follows Android development best practices.
